query: SELECT Cod AS cod_cliente, Nome AS nome_cliente, a."Nome Fantasia" AS nome_fantasia, a.Cidade AS cidade, a.UF AS uf, a."Segmento Mercado" AS segmento_mercado, a."Tp Pessoa" AS tipo_pessoa, a."Tp Cliente" AS tipo_cliente, a.Representante AS representante FROM cadcli a

SELECT i.Cod AS cod_item, i."Desc Int" AS descricao, i."Sub-Família" AS sub_familia, i."Tipo Item" AS tipo_item, i."Situação" AS situacao, i."UM Armazenamento" as um_armazenamento, i."UM Venda" as um_venda, i."UM Compra" as um_compra, i."Ax Padrão" as ax_padrao, i."Custo 1" as custo_item, i."Custo 3" as custo_roteiro FROM caditem i
SELECT g.Cod AS cod_grupo, g."Descrição" AS descricao FROM cadgrupo g
SELECT f.Cod AS cod_familia, f."Descrição" AS descricao, f."Grupo" AS cod_grupo FROM cadfam f
SELECT sf.Cod AS cod_sub_familia, sf."Descrição" AS descricao, sf."Familia" AS cod_familia FROM cadsfam sf
SELECT r.Cod AS cod_representante, r."Descrição" AS nome_representante, r.Cidade AS cidade, r.Ativo AS ativo FROM cadrep r
SELECT c.Cod AS cod_cidade, c."Descrição" AS cidade, c.UF AS uf FROM cadcid c
SELECT u.Cod AS cod_uf, u."Descrição" AS uf FROM caduf u where u.Cod is not null
SELECT m.Rep AS cod_representante, m.Mes AS mes, m.Ano AS ano, m.valor AS valor FROM cadmetas m
SELECT pg.Cod AS cod_cond_pgto, pg."Descrição" AS descricao FROM cadcpgto pg

SELECT it."Nr Ped" AS nro_pedido, it.Cod AS cod_item, it.Qtde AS qtd_vendida, it."Qtde Atendida" AS qtd_atendida, it."Preço Unitário" AS preco_unitario, (it.Qtde * it."Preço Unitário") AS valor_vendido, (it."Qtde Atendida" * it."Preço Unitário") AS valor_atendido, it."Dt Entrega" AS dt_entrega, ped."Dt Emissão" AS dt_emissao, ped.Cliente AS cod_cliente, ped.Cidade AS cod_cidade, ped.Representante AS cod_representante, ped."Comissão" AS cod_comissao, ped."Tipo NFS" AS cfop, ped."Condição Pgto" AS cod_cond_pgto FROM caditped it LEFT JOIN cadpedv ped ON it."Nr Ped" = ped."Nr Ped"

SELECT it."Nr Nota" AS nro_nota, it.Cod AS cod_item, it.Qtde AS qtd_vendida, it."Preço Unitário" AS preco_unitario, (it.Qtde * it."Preço Unitário") AS valor_vendido, nf."Dt Emissão" AS dt_emissao, nf.Cliente AS cod_cliente, nf.Cidade AS cod_cidade, nf.Representante AS cod_representante, (nf."Comissão"/100) AS perc_comissao, ((it.Qtde * it."Preço Unitário")*(nf."Comissão"/100)) AS valor_comissao, trim(nf."Tipo NFS") AS cfop, nf."Condição Pgto" AS cod_cond_pgto, nf."StatusNFE" AS status_nfe FROM caditnfs it LEFT JOIN cadnfs nf ON it."Nr Nota" = nf."Nr Nota"
SELECT DISTINCT tp."Cod" as codigo, tp."Nat Operação" AS cfop, tp."Gera CR" AS gera_cr FROM cadtpnfs tp
select s.Cod as cod_segmento, s."Descrição" as segmento from cadseg s

select o."Nro" as nro_ordem, o."Cod" as cod_item, o."Tipo" as tipo_ordem, o."Qtde" as qtd_producao, o."Qtde Bx" as qtd_bx, o."Posição" as posicao, o."Dt Início" as dt_inicio, o."Dt Fim" as dt_fim, o."dt_lib" as dt_liberacao, o."dt_bx" as dt_bx, o."qtde_rejeitada" from cadordem o

select ap."Ordem" as nro_ordem, ap."Seq" as sequencial, ap."Cod" as cod_item, ap."Operacao" as operacao, ap."Data" as dt_apontamento, ap."Data_Previsao" as dt_previsao, ap."Ax" as cod_almox, ap."Qtde" as qtde_consumida from cadapontamento ap
select ax."Cod" as cod_almox, ax."Descrição" as almoxarifado, ax."Localização" as localizacao, ax."Fornecedor" as cod_fornecedor, ax."Cliente" as cod_cliente, ax."Situacao" as situacao from cadax ax

select nf."Nr Nota" as nro_nota, nf."Dt Emissão" as dt_emissao, nf."Total Itens" as valor_itens, nf."Desconto" as desconto, nf."Cliente" as cod_cliente, nf."Representante" as cod_rep, nf."Comissão" as perc_comissao, nf."Total Nota" as valor_nota, nf."StatusNFE" as status_nota, nf."Tipo NFS" as cfop, nf."Vr Frete" as valor_frete from cadnfs nf

select r."Titulo" as nro_titulo, r."Parcela" as parcela, r."Cliente" as cod_cliente, r."Tp Mvto" as tipo_movimento, r."Dt Emissão" as dt_emissao, r."Nr NFS" as nro_nf, r."Dt Vcto" as dt_vencto, r."Portador" as cod_portador, r."Tp Cobrança" as tipo_cobranca, r."Vr Título" as vlr_titulo, r."Vr Pago" as vlr_pago, r."Vr Desconto" as vlr_descto, r."Vr Juro" as vlr_juro, r."Dt Movimento" as dt_movto from cadcr r

select p."Titulo" as nro_titulo, p."Parcela" as parcela, p."Tp Mvto" as tipo_movimento, p."Fornecedor" as cod_fornecedor, p."Dt Emissão" as dt_emissao, p."Dt Vcto" as dt_vencto, p."Portador" as cod_portador, p."Dt Movimento" as dt_movto, p."Vr Título" as vlr_titulo, p."Vr Pago" as vlr_pago, p."Vr Desconto" as vlr_descto, p."Vr Juro" as vlr_juro from cadcp p
select cb."Data" as dt_movto, cb.port as cod_portador, cb."Historico" as historico, cb."Flag" as tipo_movto, cb."Valor" as vlr_movto from cadbolcx cb
select p."Cod" as cod_portador, p."Descrição" as nome_portador from cadport2 p
select op."Cod" as cod_ope, op."Desc" as desc_ope, op."Setor" as setor, op."Origem" as origem from cadop op

select r."Item" as cod_item, r."Seq" as sequencial, r."Op" as cod_ope, r."Tempo" as tempo, r."Rec_perda" as rec_perda, r."Tpo_corr" as tpo_corr, r."Tpo_prep" as tpo_prep, r."Lote_ideal" as lote_ideal, r."Desc_op" as desc_ope, r."Qtde_fun_prep" as qtde_fun_prep, r."Qtde_fun_ope" as qtde_fun_ope, r."Total_prep" as total_prep, r."Total_hr_homem" as total_hr_homem, r."Total_hr_maq" as total_hr_maq, r."Total_ope" as total_ope, r."maq", r."fer", r."VTot_Prep" as vtot_prep, r."VTot_Oper" as vtot_oper, r."VTot_HrHomem" as vtot_hrhomem, r."VTot_HrMaquina" as vtot_hrmaquina, r."VTot_Rot" as vtot_rot, r."programa" from cadrot r
select cus."Cod" as cod_item, cus."Preco_Base" as preco_base, cus."Preco_Final" as preco_final from cadcusto cus
select est."Cod Pai" as cod_item_pai, est."Cod Filho" as cod_item_filho, est."Operacao" as operacao, est."Qtde" as qtd_consumo, est.ordem, est."Perda" as perda from cadestr est
